experiences.text_intro: Frontend Web Developer responsible for developing multi-tenant business landing pages and CMS platforms for branding and digital marketing purposes.
description_role: Developed three production web products, including marketing landing pages and a reusable business website platform.
Built conversion-focused landing pages for Google Ads using Nuxt.js and vanilla HTML.
Implemented a multi-tenant website system using dynamic routing (/[slug]) to serve multiple business websites from a single platform.
Developed admin and business owner dashboards to manage business profiles, WhatsApp contacts, logos, services, portfolios, and blog content.
Enabled non-technical users to independently manage and publish their business websites.

experiences.text_intro: Developed an end-to-end workshop management system to digitalize operational, service, and financial processes for a local automotive workshop.
description_role: Built a fullstack workshop management system using React.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, Express.js, and MySQL.
Implemented role-based access control for Cashier and Manager with distinct operational workflows.
Developed cashier features for inventory management, customer records, service records, and transactions.
Automated financial calculations including revenue, expenses, and 11% VAT upon service completion.
Generated PDF invoices using PDFKit and implemented file uploads for inventory images and payment proofs.
Designed and optimized relational databases using DBDiagram with soft delete strategies.

experiences.text_intro: Frontend Developer Intern contributing to multiple web products within a Cognitive SOC (Security Operations Center) platform.
description_role: Redesigned and developed the SOC dashboard frontend using Next.js based on provided UI/UX designs.
Developed SecGaOne marketing landing pages using Nuxt.js to support branding and Google Ads campaigns.
Built SecGaOne dashboards with user and admin roles, enabling VM monitoring, documentation access, certificate generation, and issue reporting.
Collaborated with backend and UI/UX teams to integrate frontend features into existing production systems.

experiences.company_name: Vocational Curriculum and Learning Research Group (VCL)
experiences.text_intro: Led backend development for an LMS and CMS platform supporting teacher education and certification programs.
description_role: Developed RESTful APIs using Express.js and PostgreSQL to manage learning modules, users, and digital content.
Implemented JWT-based authentication, file uploads with Multer, and automated certificate generation using EJS and Puppeteer.
Integrated Midtrans payment gateway for certification-related transactions.
Designed and optimized relational databases using DBDiagram and Sequelize ORM.
Managed development workflow using agile practices with Trello.

experiences.text_intro: Developed an organizational profile website to support branding and information dissemination for PERPIGI.
description_role: Built a CMS-based organization website using native PHP and Bootstrap 5.
Implemented a dynamic news management system and organizational content pages.
Developed an admin dashboard to manage news, logo philosophy, carousel content, and organization details.

experiences.text_intro: Developed a web-based UMKM funding platform as part of Bangkit Academyâ€™s capstone project.
description_role: Built a fullstack web application using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, and PostgreSQL.
Implemented core features including UMKM funding listings, activity feeds, investor dashboards, and user profile management.
Integrated role-based authentication for UMKM owners and investors.
Deployed the application on Google Cloud Platform using Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, Cloud Storage, and App Engine.

experiences.text_intro: Cloud Computing participant at Bangkit Academy, selected through a competitive national process.
description_role: Learned and applied cloud computing concepts using Google Cloud Platform.
Completed coursework covering Cloud Engineer, DevOps, and Site Reliability Engineering tracks.
Collaborated on early-stage development of WiraDana prior to capstone qualification.

experiences.text_intro: Frontend Web Developer Intern contributing to a CMS-based mental health platform.
description_role: Developed admin dashboard features using Laravel 10 and Bootstrap 5.
Redesigned the counseling services page to improve usability and accessibility.
Collaborated with frontend, backend, and UI/UX teams using Notion.

experiences.text_intro: Fullstack developer for CareerConnect, awarded Best Final Project at Rakamin Academy.
description_role: Developed RESTful APIs for job seeker profile management using Node.js and Express.js.
Built responsive frontend features using Next.js and Chakra UI.
Collaborated using Git and Trello to support efficient team development.
